user_question: Can you tell me about the history of marble sculpture and generate an image of a modern abstract marble sculpture?
final_answer: Marble sculpture has a rich history dating back to ancient Greece and Rome, where it was used to create some of the most iconic statues. Modern abstract marble sculptures often explore new forms and ideas, breaking away from traditional representations. Image of a modern abstract marble sculpture generated. Famous marble sculptures include Michelangelo's David, the Venus de Milo, and the Winged Victory of Samothrace.
